message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can move on.
I'll take a bigger share, but still leaving you with a decent amount
That's a bit too one-sided. I'm not willing to give up 80% of the remaining amount.
I'm willing to compromise. This way, we both get a decent share, and we can move on.
I'll take a bigger share, but I'm willing to give you a small consolation prize
That's a very small consolation prize. I'm not willing to give up 90% of the remaining amount.
I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise considering the decreasing value of money.
